pageContext.title: The Thomas MacGreevy Archive
pageContext.description_excerpt: The Thomas MacGreevy Archive is a long-term, interdisciplinary research project that explores the life, writings, and relationships of the Irish poet and critic, Thomas MacGreevy (1893-1967). The project is committed to investigating the intersections between traditional humanities research and digital technologies.
pageContext.participants: Amit Kumar, Christopher Baran, Elizabeth Tobey, Eric White, Gretchen Gueguen, Kevin Lynch, Susan Schreibman
